programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Comblain-la-Tour Jazz Festival
programme.desc: As one of the best Hammond B3 organ players, Jimmy McGriff (1936-2008) is often lost among great soul-jazz organists from his hometown of Philadelphia. Of the major soul-jazz pioneers, he was the bluesiest and often insisted that he was more of a blues musician than a jazz artist. Regardless, he remained eclectic enough to blur the lines of genres. His sound - deep, down-to-earth grooves drenched in blues and gospel feeling - made him popular with RandB audiences. This 1965 performance is part of the Comblain-la-Tour Jazz Festival.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. The 2018 edition of WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its showcase participants, Mario Batkovic, aims to explore the sonic possibilities of the accordion, without effects or loops, rather through a mutualist symbiotic relationship between man and instrument. Challenging, hypnotic, and grandiose, Batkovics single-handed symphonic vision is certainly unique.

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. In 2018, WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its showcase participants, Lucibela, comes from the island of Sao Nicolau. Her assured, warm voice is shaped by years of assimilation to the sounds of morna and coladeira.

programme.title: Freddie Hubbard and The Satchmo Legacy Live in 1987
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. This concert of Freddie Hubbard and the Satchmo Legacy in 1987, highlights the bebop legends classic style and silky tone. Hubbard is an American jazz trumpeter whose unmistakable and influential tone contributed to new perspectives for modern jazz and bebop. He was also a well-known part of Art Blakey and the Jazz Messengers and is primarily known for playing bebop, hard bop, and post-bop styles from the early 60s onwards.

programme.title: Festival Vue sur la Relève
programme.sub-title: Festival Vue sur la Relève: SHPIK
programme.desc: Montreals very own jazz group SHPIK offers a bold and impressionistic music, drawing its inspirations from jazz, nature, and film. Evoking the great outdoors, self-discovery, and navigating between the immense and the infinitely small, this first album offers an intricate musical journey that is both energetic and reflective. Consisting of pianist and composer Arnaud Spick-Saucier, bassist Etienne Dextraze, drummer Philippe Lussier-Baillargeon, and saxophonist/flutist Alex Dodier, SHPIK has performed at famous jazz events, including the Montreal International Jazz Festival. Do yourself a favour by not missing this extraordinary breath of fresh air.

programme.title: Duke Ellington Orchestra - Het Concertgebouw
programme.desc: The Royal Concertgebouw in Amsterdam is a world-renowned concert hall, known for its first-rate acoustics. It has attracted many famous performers over the years and is one of the Netherlands most treasured musical institutions. On November 2, 1958, American jazz titan Duke Ellington and his Orchestra performed two concerts at the Concertgebouw in Amsterdam. Among the many talents in the Orchestra were trumpeter Clark Terry, trombonist Quentin Jackson, saxophonist Johnny Hodges and violinist Ray Nance.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1987, prominent guitarist George Benson brought his band to kick off day three of the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. Joining him to play songs from their joint album "Collaborations" was Grammy award-winning acoustic guitarist Earl Klugh.

programme.title: Seine Sessions
programme.desc: The term "jam-session" was born in the 1920s, when black and white musicians gathered in smoke-filled bars after their respective concerts to enjoy the kind of jazz they could not play in traditional sets. Bing Crosby was a regular at these sessions, and had fun marking the first and third beats of musical phrases by clapping hands, which the musicians call "jammin the beat". Today, the Seine Sessions revive the happy years of "jam sessions", while the cream of jazz, blues, gipsy and funk Parisian scenes occurs on the boards of the legendary restaurant and jazz club Le Reservoir. Entitled "World Music", this episode hosted by Eddy King features unique performances by artists playing together for the first time, and interviews with Teofilo Chantre, Tiwitine, Kinsy Ray, and many others.

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.sub-title: The Morgenland Festival: A Trace of Grace
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival of Osnabrueck has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. This episode entitled "A Trace Of Grace" features the rich and complex music of Michel Godard and Kayhan Kalhor, two musicians interested in instruments poorly known in the West. Kayhan plays, for example, the Kamancheh, an ancient Persian instrument known for its slow and melancho sound.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Burton and Ozone - Munchner Klaviersommer
programme.desc: "Munchner Klaviersommer" was an annual concerts series that took place from 1981 to 1998 in Munich, Germany. Although the festivals name suggests a strong focus on piano music, it featured countless famous musicians from jazz and classical music - not just pianists. The concerts were usually held in July at The Gasteig, home of the Munich Philharmonic. In 1995, vibraphonist Gary Burton and pianist Makoto Ozone, both great jazz players noted for their virtuoso technique and innovative style, came together to give a concert of improvised music. They delighted the audience with their fluid, poetic artistry, which was expressed in a performance of the highest order.

programme.title: Georgie Fame and the Blue Flames
programme.desc: Georgie Fame, known for "Yeh, Yeh" and "The Ballad of Bonnie and Clyde" makes a triumphant comeback with The Blue Flames. Georgie Fame and the Blue Flames was a popular band in the UK in the 60s, celebrated for its RandB, soul, jazz, ska, and pop sounds. The training was largely inspired by ska, a popular musical style in Jamaican cafes in London at the time. It was the song "Green Onions" from the Booker T and The MG that inspired Georgie to incorporate the Hammond organ into her compositions. This performance by Georgie Fame and the Blue Flames is brimming with blues and soulful sounds that will delight the groups old and new fans.

programme.title: Baden Powell Quartet - Jazz Samba
programme.desc: Recorded in 1971 in Paris, France, Brazilian, classically trained bossa nova guitarist Baden Powell and his quartet play Pai, Lotus (written by Baden Powell), Tristeza (by Haroldo Lobo/Niltinho), Round Midnight (by Thelonious Monk), Nega do cabelo duro (by David Nasser/Rubens Soares), and Aos pes da cruz (by Ze da Zilda/Marino Pinto). Powell is joined by Ernesto Ribeiro-Gonçalves on double bass, Helio Schiavo on drums, and Alfredo Bessa on percussion.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Brazilian NYE
programme.desc: The Da Pá Virada Sessions series presents the best musicians of contemporary Brazilian jazz, and beyond. Filmed in Sao Paulo, each session offers a unique experience by giving a fresh look into Brazils music scene. The artists for each session are selected in consultation with Stingray DJAZZs music editor. One of the artists taking part in this series is Paulo Novaes. Coming from a family of musicians, Paulo Novaes has already lived through a lifetime of music in spite of his young age. Paulo is the cousin of singer Bruna Caram, with whom he performed in Sao Paulo, Madrid, Barcelona, Lisbon, and other major cities. As a singer, composer, and instrumentalist, his creativity is enjoyed in many forms. With three albums out and his song "Perdoa" reaching over 20 million streams on Spotify, he steps into the spotlights time and time again. Now Da Pá Virada Sessions and Stingray present Paulo Novaes in this intimate performance, recorded in Novaes native city Sao Paulo.

programme.title: Sven Hammond Soul
programme.sub-title: Sven Hammond Soul: Tivoli de Helling
programme.desc: Although its music might sound like the sound track of any 1970s American car chase movie, the band Sven Hammond Soul is from the Netherlands. This steaming soul machine is headed by Sven Figee, who prefers to attack rather than play his Hammond organ. In April 2012, the band was augmented with vocalist Jenny Lane. Todays recordings were made at a steaming live performance at Utrechts Tivoli in 2012.

programme.title: Manu Katche - The scOpe
programme.desc: Manu Katche is one of Frances most famous jazz drummers, who originally studied piano at the Conservatory in Paris before he switched to percussion. He presented his tenth album, "The scOpe", which incorporates elements of jazz, rock, and world music, at the 2020 edition of Festival Jazz au Sommet in France. Katche is joined on stage by Jerôme Regard on bass, Alfio Origlio on piano, Walter Ricci on vocals, and Patrick Manouguian on guitar.

programme.title: Visions of Music
programme.desc: Visions of Music - World Jazz invites the viewer on a journey to the roots of music, introducing the enormous impact that traditional music from around the world has had on contemporary jazz. This program features legendary musicians such as BB King, Dino Saluzzi, Tito Puente, Carlos Santana, Zawinul Joe, Manu Dibango, Abdullah Ibrahim, as well as new generation representatives such as Nicholas Payton, Cyro Baptista, and Don Byron. This episode of the Visions of Music series presents the musette, a French musical genre that was first introduced by musicians from the south of France. It is to Django Reindhardt, the "virtuoso with three fingers" that we owe the introduction of the swing to the musette.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Come Twogether ft. Benjamin Herman
programme.desc: Instead of childrens songs, the sound of jazz standards was always present. They practiced intricate drum rhythms instead of Bach etudes: Simon Oslender and Jerôme Cardynaals have jazz running through their veins! Under the name "Twogether" both youngsters celebrate a very unique and soulful style of funky blues-jazz. They create a sound that leaves even renowned jazz artists speechless. The two, exceptionally talented boys met in a youth big band, and before long they became a musical team. Immediately after that, they won the first prize in the Prinses Christina Jazz Concours in Amsterdam, which got the whole thing started. In this concert, they perform with wonderful artists such as the Dutch saxophonist Benjamin Herman and the American vocalist Madeline Bell.

programme.title: Lady Day - The Many Faces Of Billie Holiday
programme.desc: Lady Day: The Many Faces of Billie Holiday tells us the story of one of jazzs greatest singers ever. Although Billie Holiday lived a life filled with tragedy, this documentary focuses more on her achievements as a singer and her exceptional ability to convey emotions through her voice, rather than going into detail about her drug and alcohol addictions and destructive relationships. Lady Day: The Many Faces of Billie Holiday features several brilliant performances of Billie Holiday. Colleagues such as Carmen McRae, Annie Ross, Mal Waldron, Buck Clayton, Harry "Sweets" Edison, and Milt Gabler offer their first-hand perspectives.

programme.title: Aki Rissanen Trio at Jazzclub Unterfahrt, Munich
programme.desc: Aki Rissanens interest in jazz came after he started taking classical piano lessons. His deep interest in improvised music placed him among top jazz pianist in his home country - Finland. While composing and performing his own music, Rissanen has also collaborated with Verneri Pohjola and Dave Liebman, and today his name appears among the top European jazz musicians. Live from "Jazzclub Unterfahrt" in Munich, Germany, together with Antti Lotjonen on bass and Teppo Makynen on drums, Rissanen showcases the best of Scandinavian jazz and its DNA - the Nordic Tone.

programme.title: Jimmy Witherspoon Quartet and Rozaa Wortham 1985
programme.desc: Estival has been an annual jazz festival since 1977 and takes place in the Italian speaking part of Switzerland named Lugano. Estival offers an exhilarating and especially a surprising line-up that focuses in a particular world of modern music with rich sounds. At Estival, promoting the splendor, tolerance and existence between different cultures is supreme. Hereby Jimmy Witherspoon and Rozaa Wortham, two exceptionally special jazz musicians. Rozaa Wortham kicks off with the Jimmy Witherspoon Quartet. Swinging and energetic she sings It Dont Mean A Thing. Jimmy Witherspoon, known for the song Aint Nobodys Business, starts his performance with pleasant layed-back blues.

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. In 2018, WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its showcase participants, Bakolo Music International, represents the pioneers of the golden age of Congolese rumba. The singer, guitarist and grand survivor Nzofu Moko Buele, known to all as Bikunda, is carrying on a torch first lit in 1948 by "Papa" Wend Kolosoy, the "father of Congolese Rumba" and composer of the first Rumba hit song, Marie-Louise.

programme.title: 29th Street Saxophone Quartet
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. The 29th Street Saxophone Quartet is an American quartet founded in 1982 by alto saxophonists Bobby Watson and Ed Jackson, tenor saxophonist Rich Rothenberg and baritone saxophonist Jim Hartog. The band has an eclectic repertoire ranging from jazz to show, funk, rap, and experimental music.

programme.title: MotorMusic Jazz Session
programme.sub-title: MotorMusic Jazz Session: From Rossini to Piazzolla
programme.desc: The MotorMusic Studios in Mechelen, Belgium, attract many great musicians to the city. A wide variety of visiting international jazz musicians share their art of making jazz music with us in the DJAZZ series Belgium Sessions. In these sessions, some of Europes finest musicians perform their own, original music. This episode is all about the Habanera Duo, which sprung from a meeting of minds between flutist Marc Grauwels and accordion player Christophe Delporte, around their shared passion for the Argentine tango and the music of Ástor Piazzolla. After hearing how well their instruments blended, these two musicians founded the Habanera Duo. The duo offers the audience an eclectic repertoire that is simultaneously refined and audacious. Expect a beautiful hodgepodge of classical music and jazz, inspired by composers ranging from Piazzolla to Gioacchino Rossini.

programme.title: Ochun Chucho
programme.desc: Legendary Cuban pianist Chucho Valdes brought his band "Jazz Batá 2" to the Malta Jazz Festival on July 19, 2019. The air was thick with anticipation as Valdes took to the stage, revisiting the small-group concept of his mythical 1972 Cuban album Jazz Batá. The batá repertoire - the deep classical music of West Africa - permeates Valdes piano solos throughout the concert. Valdess band consists of Dreiser Durruthy (Batas and vocals), Yaroldy Abreu (percussions and vocals), Abraham Mansfarroll (percussion), Ramon Vazquez Martirena-Bajo (bass guitar). They delivered a performance that reverberated through the historic island.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Seun Kuti and Egypt - Moods
programme.desc: Since its opening in 1992, jazz club Moods has developed into one of Zurichs largest and most prominent cultural venues. At the same time, it has become one of Europes prominent jazz clubs which today enjoys a well-deserved worldwide reputation among musicians and critics. The venue books a large variety of genres, ranging from jazz and soul to electronic and international music. Afrobeat founder Fela Kutis youngest son Seun performs at Moods. The singer and saxophonist combines his fathers political engagement with the charisma and wit of a great entertainer.

programme.title: Ruben Hein and NJJO - Jazz in Duketown
programme.desc: Jazz in Duketown is the largest free outdoor jazz festival in the Netherlands. Its a real gathering for jazz addicts, inviting internationally renowned artists. One of them is Dutch singer, pianist, composer and bandleader Ruben Hein. Widely praised for his warm and characteristic voice and his offbeat piano playing, Ruben Hein is the artistic director and conductor of the National Youth Jazz Orchestra (NJJO). At Jazz in Duketown he performs a jazzy set, accompanied by his 18 finest proteges.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Munchner Klaviersommer
programme.desc: "Munchner Klaviersommer" was an annual concerts series that took place from 1981 to 1998 in Munich, Germany. Although the festivals name suggests a strong focus on piano music, it featured countless famous musicians from jazz and classical music - not just pianists. The concerts were usually held in July at The Gasteig, home of the Munich Philharmonic. In 1985, jazz quartet Phalanx appeared at the festival. The quartet featured guitarist James "Blood" Ulmer, drummer Rashied Ali, tenor saxophonist George Adams, and bassist Sirone. This short-lived group, which was described as "an ad-hoc supergroup that thrived and disappeared", produced three albums in the period 1986-1988.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. Back in 1981, legendary American singer James Brown gave an unforgettable performance at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. The "Godfather of Soul", "Mr. Dynamite", and "Soul Brother No. 1" was a major force in 20th century popular music, influencing many musicians in numerous genres.

programme.title: Ellen Pels - Love 2/2
programme.desc: Dutch jazz singer Ellen Pels presents her latest release, "Love." Recorded live at Theater Odeon in Zwolle, the Netherlands, Ellen is joined by The Red Limo String Quartet and her own nine-piece rhythm section. The singer combines her passionate love for music with her own, stirring lyrics, inspired by spiritual philosophers like Paulo Coelho, Eckhard Tolle, and Deepak Chopra. Her spiritually saturated music is challenging and theatrical, yet warm and melodic.

programme.title: The Crusaders
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. The Crusaders, an American jazz fusion group that was popular in the 70s employed a two-manned front-line horn section. The groups sound was rooted in hard bop, with an emphasis on RandB and soul. Their performance at Estival is beyond soulful and an amazing show to watch.

programme.title: Tribute to Django Reinhardt
programme.sub-title: Tribute to Django Reinhardt: Rosenberg meets Beets
programme.desc: World-class Dutch jazz pianist Peter Beets has shared the stage with jazz greats Chick Corea, Wynton Marsalis, "Toots" Thielemans, Elvin Jones, George Coleman, Johnny Griffin, Benny Golson, and John Clayton. His mother a music teacher and his father an Oscar Peterson and Art Blakey enthusiast, Beets was surrounded by music from an early age. And though music was in their blood, neither parent associated the word "musician" with a career. In this broadcast, Peter Beets teams up with gipsy jazz heros Stochelo Rosenberg, Martin Limberger and Frans van Geest. The strength and precision of Van Geests rhythms and tempo, and the ease with which Stochelos lead guitar soars above them, make this band a cohesive collective - unique in their renditions of standards, Djangos classic compositions, and original tunes composed by Stochelo himself.

programme.title: Sammy Price and his All Star Orchestra
programme.desc: Texan pianist Sammy Price (1908-1992) played everything from blues and boogie-woogie to swing and jump-blues. Starting in Dallas as a singer and dancer in Alphonso Trents orchestra, he went to Kansas to form the Texas Bluesicians. At the end of the 1930s, and as a house pianist for the Decca label, he backed many stars, including Sister Rosetta Tharpe and Trixie Smith. Price was equally at home playing the blues in a trio, or leading a bigger band playing the jump-blues people loved to dance to. In this 1958 recording, Sammy plays the Comblain-La-Tour Jazz Festival with his band.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Sarah Vaughan Live in 58 and 64
programme.sub-title: Sarah Vaughan Live in 58 and 64: The Divine One
programme.desc: Sarah Vaughan: Live in 58 and 64 features the "Divine One" in her prime, wrapping her sultry voice around jazz standards such as Lover Man, "Misty" and "I Got Rhythm" and soaring on popular showtunes such as "Over The Rainbow" and Maria. One of the greatest voices of the 20th Century, her renditions of songs by Harold Arlen, Leonard Bernstein, Johnny Burke, the Gershwins and Stephen Sondheim are pure diva magic. These three performances demonstrate why Sarah Vaughan is invariably mentioned in the same breath as Ella Fitzgerald and Billie Holiday.

programme.title: George Shearing Duo feat. Neil Swainson
programme.desc: British pianist George Shearing enjoyed an international reputation as an instrumentalist, arranger, and composer. Equally at home on the classical concert stage as in jazz clubs, he was recognized for his inventive, orchestrated jazz. In this live recording from the Munich Philharmonie, Shearing played in a duo format with Canadian double bassist Neil Swainson. The repertoire consisted of a selection of compositions by Shearing himself, among them Lullaby Of Birdland, which is a standard in jazz repertoire.

programme.title: Dionne Warwick live at the 27 Club
programme.desc: Dionne Warwicks vocal artistry ranges from voluminous deep register to soft, fragile high notes. She masters the entire range with almost unnerving ease. But more than her strong, warm voice, Dionnes magic is in the silky elegance and the secure delivery with which she tells a story. Thats how her, along with composer Burt Bacharach and lyricist Hal David become pioneers of the brand of pop music called "Middle of the Road", meaning pop that is grippingly simple, but never trite. Sixty of her hits made it into the American charts and sold over 100 million albums worldwide. This amazing 1964 recording from the 27 Club in Knokke, Belgium showcases the 23-year-old star vocalist at the start of her career.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. Back in 1982, legendary jazz clarinettist Benny Goodman performed at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague with his septet. The "King of Swing" revisited the atmosphere of the 1930s, when jazz enjoyed tremendous popularity.

programme.title: Kurhaus Scheveningen
programme.desc: The Dutch world-class jazz pianist Peter Beets has shared the stage with jazz greats like Chick Corea, Wynton Marsalis, "Toots" Thielemans, Elvin Jones, George Coleman, Johnny Griffin, Benny Golson and John Clayton. From birth, Beets was surrounded by music: he heard classical music from his mother, who is a music pedagogue, and he heard jazz from his father, who has a great fan of Oscar Peterson and Art Blakey. Although Beets parents originally did not associate the word "musician" with the word "career", music is definitely in the familys blood. At this concert at the Kurhaus in Scheveningen, the Netherlands, Peter Beets teams up with the world-famous guitarist Kurt Rosenwinkel. With a career spanning almost twenty-five years and including collaborating with dynamic peers like Brad Mehldau, Brian Blade, Mark Turner, Joshua Redman, Chris Potter, as well as esteemed jazz legends like Joe Henderson, Paul Motian and Gary Burton, Rosenwinkels indelible mark in music is the consummation of being steeped in the rich and deep traditions of jazz, springing off of the shoulders of such vital underpinnings to elevate his own art to new heights, evolving the language in a way no other guitarist has since his arrival. This collaboration between Beets and Rosenwinkel guarantees brilliant music.

programme.title: Jacob Karlzon Trio - Open Waters
programme.desc: Swedish pianist Jacob Karlzon is joined by Danish bassist Morten Ramsbøl and Swedish drummer Rasmus Kihlberg at the Steinway piano factory in Hamburg to present their album Open Waters. Karlzon, a classically trained pianist who shared a stage with Kenny Wheeler, Norma Winstone, and Billy Cobham keeps the rich tradition of Swedish jazz eclecticism alive. Back in 2012, Karlzon explored the world of heavy metal, after that allowing electronic elements to set the pulse.

programme.title: Spiral
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1982, the Superstar Quintet, which consists of the otherworldly American trumpeter Freddie Hubbard, saxophonist Joe Henderson, drummer Tony Williams, bassist Ron Carter, and pianist Kenny Baron performed at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. The star-studded fivesome put on a concert of cosmic proportions.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Face au public
programme.desc: Legendary African-American folk singer Odetta (1930-2008) sang her spirituals with immeasurable sorrow and anguish. Her spiritual music expresses the horrific impact of slavery on millions of African people stolen from their homeland. For Odetta, folk music—be it spirituals, blues or field songs—was a vehicle for expressing the racism and injustice experienced by black people dating back to the days of slavery. This 1964 episode of Face au Public shows the melancholy of the era.

programme.title: Michel Legrand Orchestra at Spa, 1982
programme.desc: Known outside jazz circles mainly for his film scores, French composer, arranger and pianist Michel Legrand has had a long and storied career in music. Interpreters of his compositions include jazz legends such as Sarah Vaughan, Stan Getz, and Bill Evans, as well as pop stars such as Barbra Streisand and Frank Sinatra. During this 1982 performance in the Belgian town of Spa, Legrand leads his orchestra through a number of original songs, including "The Summer Knows," "What Are You Doing the Rest of Your Life?" and "Les Moulins de mon Cœur." Singing either in English or French, Legrand delivers a spirited performance with plenty of romantic flair that is sure to capture your heart.

programme.title: On the Road With Duke Ellington
programme.sub-title: On the Road With Duke Ellington: II
programme.desc: In May 2014, the Conservatory of Amsterdam hosted a unique conference about one of the greatest jazz composers of the 20th century: Duke Ellington. Musicologists and musicians with a special bond with Ellington and his music spoke about his life and music. Among them were David Schiff, author of The Ellington Century, and Harvey Cohen, author of Duke Ellingtons America. Moreover, concerts were played by jazz pianist Matt Cooper, the Calefax Reed Quintet, and the Concert Big Band of the Conservatory of Amsterdam conducted by David Berger. The winner of the Boy Edgar Prize 2013, viola player Oene van Geel, performed his All Ellington Project.

programme.title: Forro Series
programme.desc: The Da Pá Virada Sessions series presents the best musicians of contemporary Brazilian jazz, and beyond. Filmed and curated in Sao Paulo by director and presenter Dani Gurgel and producer and engineer Thiago Rabello, each session offers a unique experience by giving a fresh look into Brazils music scene. The artists for each session are selected in consultation with Stingray DJAZZs music editor. Drawing from her Brazilian roots, upcoming vocalist Fran Nobrega is poring todays underground scene to bring us the latest trends in forro and popular Brazilian music. Her album "A flor e o Tempo" has won her a strong cult following, and her performances exude positive energy: get ready to dance to Nobregas exciting set!

programme.title: Lucky Chops - Live at BIRD
programme.desc: The NYC band Lucky Chops rose to fame when a video of their performance at a subway station went viral on YouTube in 2015. Since then, the energetic quintet has been entertaining audiences all over the world. The band was formed in 2006, when trumpeter Joshua Gawel, saxophonist Daro Behroozi, trombonist Josh Holcomb, tubist Raphael Buyo, and drummer Charles Sams, met during their education at Fiorello H. LaGuardia High School of Music and Art and Performing Arts. Besides touring globally, Lucky Chops also aspires to inspire new generations of musicians by regularly performing at clinics and educational outreaches. In August 2018, they performed their high-energy brassy funk at BIRD, in Rotterdam.

programme.title: Jazz à Vienne
programme.desc: A number of spellbinding performances from Jazz à Vienne, a well-known Jazz Festival that takes place annually, in France. Every evening there are concerts in the ancient Roman theater of Vienne. Among the performers there have been musicians such as Miles Davis, Stan Getz, Michel Petrucciani, Ella Fitzgerald, and many more. In addition to the main concerts there are smaller ones on other stages in the city, and in pubs and musical moves.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Kenny Barron, Calypso
programme.desc: Pianist Kenny Barrons June 27, 2019 appearance at the Alfa Jazz Festival in Ukraines Lviv was a celebration of sublime jazz virtuosity. The revered elder statesmen of jazz piano brought his regular working trio of Kiyoshi Kitagawa (bass) and Jonathan Blake (drums), augmented by stellar jazzman Marcus Strickland (tenor saxophone) and young lion Riley Mulherkar (trumpet). Their seamless blend of classic bebop and modern explorations spoke of a deep, emotive connection to each note, captivating the Ukrainian audience with lyrical improvisations during this unforgettable concert.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Seine Sessions
programme.desc: The term "jam-session" was coined in the 1920s when black and white musicians gathered in smoke-filled bars after their respective concerts to enjoy the kind of jazz they could not play in traditional sets. Bing Crosby was a regular at these sessions, and had fun marking the first and third beats of musical phrases by clapping hands, which the musicians call "jammin the beat". Today, the Seine Sessions revive the happy years of "jam sessions", while the cream of jazz, blues, gipsy and funk Parisian scenes occurs on the boards of the legendary restaurant and jazz club Le Reservoir. Titled "Legendary Jazz", this episode hosted by Eddy King features unique performances by artists playing together for the first time, and interviews with Steve McCraven, Oona Guino, Rodolphe Lauretta, and many others.

programme.title: Stingray PausePlay
programme.desc: We Pause and chat with local and international artists to get an in-depth look at their lives and music, they Play some amazing music in these, one-of-a-kind, live sessions! These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals give a good impression of the jazz world. Both famous and less famous jazz artists will give a new insight in their life. DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that special song, what was the first record they bought and what is his or her most precious musical memory. The festival portraits are beautiful reports filmed at the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the memory of the festival, the music and the experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Gary Peacock Trio ft. Marc Copland and Joey Baron
programme.desc: Legendary double bass player Gary Peacocks resume reads like the history of jazz from the early 1960s to today: he performed with Albert Ayler, Sonny Rollins, Miles Davis, Bill Evans, Jimmy Giuffre, Paul Bley, Archie Shepp, Paul Motian. Moreover, he was Keith Jarretts double bassist for 35 years. Now he takes to the road once again, with pianist Marc Copland and percussionist Joey Baron. The trio cultivates the finest music of the moment.

programme.title: Ramon Valle and Reinier Baas - Music Meeting
programme.desc: Since 1985, the Dutch city of Nijmegen has been welcoming the International Music Meeting Festival every Pentecost. Ranging from jazz and improvisational music to traditional music and unique crossovers, this adventurous festival is all about musical encounters and international collaborations. Disrupted by COVID-19, the festivals 2020 edition had to adapt to new challenges. It now presents this exclusive concert by pianist Ramon Valle and guitarist Reinier Baas, filmed at Concertgebouw De Vereeniging in Nijmegen.

programme.title: We Are Birds - La Ciotat
programme.desc: Nordic afro jazz project "We Are Birds" saw the light between Finland and Africa, during a 2010 jam session in which Finnish jazz pianist Tuomas A. Turunen met African drummer-percussionist and urban griot Dimitri Reverchon. The two composers set their mind to exploring this hybrid genre, and found their perfect complement in bassist Emmanuel Soulignac, who brought his pop influences to the table. Today, We Are Birds explores an accessible mix of jazz and world pop that is based on sharing, listening, understanding, paying attention to each other, and believing in unity.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Binker Goldings Band - Moods
programme.desc: After abandoning the quartet format for a decade, saxophonist Binker Golding is once again the center of a quartet formation. After successful projects like Binker and Moses (with drummer Moses Boyd) and collaborations with pianist Elliot Galvin, Golding now settles for a jazzier sound. His new quartet with Sarah Tandy (piano), Dan Casimir (bass), and Sam Jones (drums) has the clear, hard-hitting jazz sound of the 80s and early 90s, brought up to date by influences from todays world of soul music.

programme.title: Lionel Hampton Big Band - Kurhaus Scheveningen
programme.desc: The Kurhaus in Scheveningen is a grand hotel in the Netherlands renowned for attracting both royal and musical nobility. Doubling as a concert hall, it has been host to several heavy hitters, such as the Rolling Stones and Ike and Tina Turner. On August 2, 1983, American vibraphonist Lionel Hampton performed at the Kurhaus in Scheveningen. Accompanied by his big band, which included talents such as saxophonist Arnett Cobb, the "King of Vibes" gave an invigorating performance with both mallets and voice.

programme.title: TorTube
programme.sub-title: TorTube: Josee Koning - Whos the Bossa
programme.desc: Jazz fans in television land have come to the right place for their dose of first-rate world jazz: TorTube! Jazz club De Tor in Enschede is one of Europes most authentic jazz venues, with an absolutely unique ambiance. Some of the best musicians from Holland and the rest of the world find their way to De Tor to perform for an appreciative audience of jazz fans. Whos the Bossa? is a TorTube episode featuring Dutch jazz singer Josee Koning, the leading Brazilian musician in the Netherlands. Inspired by the music of Antônio Carlos Jobim, this grande dame takes you on a musical journey through the streets of Sao Paulo.

programme.title: Da Pá Virada Sessions
programme.desc: The Da Pá Virada Sessions series presents the best musicians of contemporary Brazilian jazz, and beyond. Filmed in Sao Paulo, each session offers a unique experience by giving a fresh look into Brazils music scene. The artists for each session are selected in consultation with Stingray DJAZZs music editor. One of the bands taking part in this series is Os Capoeira. This ensemble practices the traditional Brazilian martial art from Bahia it is named after, combining elements of dance, acrobatics, and percussive music. Moreover, Os Capoeira runs a cultural center in Sao Paulo. Let yourself be inspired by Os Capoeiras unique take on Brazilian culture!

programme.title: Da Pá Virada Sessions
programme.desc: The Da Pá Virada Sessions series presents the best musicians of contemporary Brazilian jazz, and beyond. Filmed in Sao Paulo, each session offers a unique experience by giving a fresh look into Brazils music scene. The artists for each session are selected in consultation with Stingray DJAZZs music editor. One of the bands taking part in this series is the ensemble Samba das Flores, which dedicates itself to exploring the worlds different rhythms, thus keeping the Brazilian heritage alive. The individual voices of the ensemble members color Samba das Floress unique sound. Let Brazilian culture and global rhythms inspire you during this Samba das Flores performance!

programme.title: Jazzahead!
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2023, jazzahead! paid special attention to Germanys jazz scene and invited thirty jazz acts from all over the world to perform over the course of three days. Among the artists presenting themselves at jazzahead! 2023 is Belgian-Japanese piano wizard Alex Koo. In his brand new Etudes for Piano, composed for and commissioned by BOZAR Brussels, he shows how his passion for jazz and classical music merge perfectly, like a marriage between Debussy, Chopin, Reich, and Rachmaninov on the one hand, and Keith Jarrett, Craig Taborn, Brian Eno, and Philip Glass on the other.

programme.title: Jazzahead!
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2024, jazzahead! paid special attention to the jazz scene of the Netherlands and invited over forty jazz acts to perform over the course of three days. Among the artists presenting themselves at jazzahead! 2024 is Alune Wade, a prominent figure in African jazz. This "supertalent" on the bass (DLF Kultur) masterfully merges African rhythms with jazz in compositions inspired by cities like Dakar, Paris, and New York. Following collaborations with the likes of Joe Zawinul and Marcus Miller, his current music blends West African energy with New Orleans soul. Wades sextet at jazzahead! 2024 is comprised of Alune Wade (vocals, bass), Harry Ahonlonsou (saxophone), Camille Passeri (trumpet), Carl-Henri Morisset (keys), Cedric Duchemann (keys), and Alix Goffic (drums).

programme.title: Under the Surface - Live at Bimhuis 2018
programme.desc: Under the Surface is an improvisational jazz band formed by drummer Joost Lijbaart, vocalist Sanne Rambags, and guitarist Bram Stadhouders. Sanne Rambags, the youngest artist of the trio, is one of the few vocalists of her generation who able to improvise effortlessly, be it by using her voice as an instrument blending with the sounds of the band, or by performing her own poetry. Joost Lijbaart, known from bands by Yuri Honing, is one of the top artists of the Dutch jazz scene. Guitarist Bram Stadhouders is one of the most renowned musicians of improvisational music in Europe. Together, the three Dutch musicians have developed their own "universal language" within the genre. Their performance at Bimhuis showcases their unique intergenerational chemistry and hypnotizing sound. Bimhuis Amsterdam provides a platform for pioneering national and international musicians by hosting over 300 concerts a year.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: November Music
programme.desc: November Music in s-Hertogenbosch has been the Dutch festival for contemporary new music since 1993. The festival offers a great combination of contemporary compositions and experimental pop, sound art, non-Western music, jazz, and improvised music. The closing concert of the 2016 edition is a good example of this musicals richness, hereby the fantastic young trio of composer and pianist Rembrandt Frerichs play together with Cello8ctet Amsterdam and renowned Iranian tar player Hossein Alizâdeh. Dutch pianist Rembrandt Frerichs studied in New York and lived in Cairo for several years. His music has the drive of American jazz and the lyricism of Eastern music, interspersed with recognizable elements from the chamber music of Claude Debussy and Maurice Ravel. The combination of Frerichs with the Cello8ctet and Alizâdeh is unique, as their music is a miracle of organic creativity, a perfectioned example of fusion between music from the old and the new world.

programme.title: Lex Jasper Trio
programme.sub-title: Lex Jasper Trio: Happy Days Are Here Again
programme.desc: Lex Jasper Trio: Happy Days Are Here Again - the title says is all… After an automobile accident and 15 years of revalidation, he is back! Together with his musical pals Edwin Corzilius (double bass) and Frits Landesbergen (drums), pianist and composer Lex Jasper celebrates his return to jazz club The Duke in the Dutch village of Nistelrode. Following his car accident, Lex nearly joined the leagues of Netherlands "forgotten" jazz heroes, though he is still considered one of the most important artists and composers of his generation and Dutch jazz history. Jasper played and recorded with all the greats, including Toots Thielemans, Clark Terry, Joe Pass, and Rita Reys.

programme.desc: Maya naaseb saarele ja paiskab kogu senise elukorralduse pea peale.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Erik ja Riina jaavad haledalt vahele. Mari otsustab Gunnariga suhtlemise lõpetada. Reet koormab Piretit too ja kohustustega. Sirje võtab Alberti uuesti pansionaati toole. Indrek kuuleb Sandralt halastamatut tõde Mari ja Gunnari kohta. Kertu vallandab Tuuli.

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Prudencio kardab, mida Julieta otsustab. Gracia toob Hipolito tagasi. Isaac naeb Elsat.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud. Austraalia
programme.desc: DJ Nicholase kirg on trap-muusika. Kas ta kohtingukaaslane Mathilde jagab tema huvi? Portugallanna Ana ja brasiillane Rodrigo keeravad Ladina-Ameerika sarmile tuure peale. Brendan tahab "tibi" - Ellie võib aga teda ullatada. Kennedy otsib usaldusvaarset ja seksikat kutti. Pealtnaha paistab Steve sobivat, kuid tema ei armasta pidutseda. Maapoiss Harry kohtub Keiraga, maaelust unistava linnaneiuga.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Harper kuuleb muret tekitavat uudist. Levi saab tõsise telefonikõne. Alf jatab oma poe saamatutesse katesse.

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Valmistuge grupikohtinguks tennises, kus uhe valallise kauntari tulevikueesmargid ei uhti Beni omadega ja mis takitab potentsiaalse suhte tekkimist.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: Craig on asja võitnud lotoga miljon dollarit ning otsustanud selle kulutada Indianas maa ostmiseks. Kas ta valib filmilikult taiusliku maja, renoveerimist vajava maja või hoopis ajaloolise kodu?

programme.title: Leegitsev armastus
programme.desc: Marie kaib esimesel valjakutsel ja aitab vaikese Sophie katuselt alla. Stefanile pakutakse tood 80 kilomeetri kaugusel. Ernst harjutab pensionarielu ja kaib sellega Irenele hirmsasti narvidele. Max kaib Lenaga ujumas. Berti bistroo pannakse ajutiselt kinni.

programme.title: Leegitsev armastus
programme.desc: Vaike Sophie usaldab oma mure Mariele ja Marie puuab aidata seda lahendada, aga asjad lahevad ikkagi kaest ara. Ernst pakub Stefanile raha laenuks. Marie lahendab Berti mure. Max ja Daniel lahevad Lena parast tulli.

programme.title: Saatmata kirjade lood
programme.desc: Postkontoridetektivid avastavad 200-aastase sõbrapaevakaardi, mis võib ajalugu muuta. Ühe vana kirja uurimine viib nad avaliku elu tegelaseni, kellele kirja sisu võib hada kaela tuua. Parast sõbrapaeva on Oliver, Shane, Norman ja Rita sudantlõhestavas olukorras.

programme.title: Saladused
programme.desc: Elina elab oma elu kabuhirmus! Nimelt on ta viimase viie aastaga kaotanud kõik oma lahedased - ema, isa, vanaema ja venna - asjaoludel, milles kõigil juhtumitel on tahtsat osa nende inimeste surmas manginud just alkohol. Arusaadavalt ei julge Elina ise enam alkoholi puutudagi ja lein ning trauma on temas kujunenud peaaegu neuroosiks…

programme.title: Reede ÕHTU!
programme.desc: Igal reedel võtavad kaks tiimi eesotsas saatejuhtide Pireti, Roberti või Juriga koos armastatud ja tuntud saatekulalistega uksteisega mõõtu erinevates poorastes ulesannetes. Õhtu saatele omasel moel ei ole aga ukski võistlus paris tavaline. Nii tuleb võistlejatel end proovile panna naiteks mangudes nagu "mõttemadin" ja "kired ja lihased". Heategevusliku saate võitja annetab 500 eurot enda valitud organisatsioonile.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud. Austraalia
programme.desc: 21-aastane Bianca on tudeng Sydneyst uhe barjaariga - ta on veel suutu. Tema kaaslane, 21-aastane Christian on Melbourneis elav kreeklane. Zoe on 23-aastane ettevõtja, kes saadetakse kohtingule merejalavaelase Mattiga. Harry hindab spontaansust ja Lyndal saab tema huumorist aru. Angelina ja Josh vahetavad oma rajusid kogemusi kohtingutega. Jazz on valmis uuesti armastust leidma - kas Garethiga?

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Harperil on hirm oma sundimata lapse parast. Kirby enesekindlus on sattunud kriisi. Alf teab rohkem, kui ta mõista annab.

programme.title: Saatmata kirjade lood
programme.desc: Oliver ja Shane uurivad oma sõprust õhtusoogiklubis, kus nad kohtuvad naisega, kes on akilise lahkumineku parast oma poiss-sõbraga šokis ja palub neil ules leida vaartuslik kiri, mille ta just mehele saatis.

programme.title: Aragoni printsess
programme.desc: Sel ajal, kui rahvas leinab Lizziet ja Katariina naeb vaeva selle nimel, et kindlustada oma abielu Harryga, šokeerib Henry perekonda, teatades oma kavatsusest austada oma naise surivoodil oeldud soovi.

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Üks valalline neid satub armukolmnurka ja peab mõlemale poissmehele koha katte naitama. Otsus luua potentsiaalne suhe uhe poissmehega võib teise eemaldamiseni viia.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus

programme.desc: Ali naaseb Rosewoodi keskkooli ja loodab heastada oma varasemad teod. Kuniks Monal ja tema kasilastel sõnaõigust on, ei saa Ali midagi teha. Caleb ja uks vana vaenlane naasevad samuti Rosewoodi.

programme.title: Armastuse saar

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Isaac keeldub Elsat uuesti kaotamast. Fernando pettub Julietas. Carmelo nõuab Adelalt aru.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: Todd on asja võitnud lotoga 700 000 dollarit ning asub otsima kaunist kodu oma perekonnale Kentuckys Louisvilleis. David Bromstad aitab varskel isal kõige sobilikumat kodu valida.

programme.title: Leegitsev armastus
programme.desc: Mooda linna kappav hobune põhjustab liiklusõnnetuse. Kui Marie hakkab asja uurima, avastab ta, et kunagise uhke ratsatalu omanik elab vaga vaestes oludes. Loomulikult tahab Marie teda aidata. Vabatahtliku tuletõrjujana peab Marie oskama ka esmaabi anda, see osutub aga tõsiseks pahkliks. Marie ja Stefan peavad kuidagi Ernstile utlema, et majaplaanid ei vasta nende nagemusele uuest kodust.

programme.title: Leegitsev armastus
programme.desc: Luisa põhjustab tulekahju ja peab ikkagi harra Leopoldi varjupaika andma. Marie valutab tema parast sudant. Marie kohtas Munchenis kaies oma vana kallimat Philippi, kes tahaks temaga uuesti kokku saada. Tanu Philippile võtab Marie vastu tahtsa otsuse.

programme.title: Saatmata kirjade lood
programme.desc: Oliver ja Shane uurivad oma sõprust õhtusoogiklubis, kus nad kohtuvad naisega, kes on akilise lahkumineku parast oma poiss-sõbraga šokis ja palub neil ules leida vaartuslik kiri, mille ta just mehele saatis.

programme.title: Saladused
programme.desc: 16-aastased keskkoolitudrukud Karoliina ja Siiri tutvuvad pidutsemise kaigus 46-aastase Veikoga, kes on tudrukutega sõbrustamisest niivõrd huvitatud, et ei kõhkle neile valja ja kalleid kingitusi tegemast. Tagasihoidlikest oludest parit tudrukud on Veiko pakutavatest materiaalsetest huvedest vaimustatud ja kasutavad meest lupsilehmana, kordagi mõtlemata, mis mehe lahkuse taga võib olla.

programme.title: Reede ÕHTU!
programme.desc: Igal reedel võtavad kaks tiimi eesotsas saatejuhtide Pireti, Roberti või Juriga koos armastatud ja tuntud saatekulalistega uksteisega mõõtu erinevates poorastes ulesannetes. Heategevusliku saate võitja annetab 500 eurot enda valitud organisatsioonile.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud. Austraalia
programme.desc: Jasmine ja Ryan, olles leidnud uhise keele audioraamatute ja sarnaste fitness-eesmarkide naol, otsustavad nad teiselegi kohtingule minna. Toitumisnõustajat Jenniferi võlub Inglise poisi Edi võrukaelasarm. Veokijuht Jakei ja farmi abitoolist Rebeccat uhendavad vaated steikidele ja mulletitele. Karen tahab luksust, Abdul aga minema saada. Neil teist kohtingut ei tule.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Eden kasib Cashil tagasi tõmmata. Abigailil tekib Nerida suhtes kahtlusi. Alf rikkub Roo plaani ara.

programme.title: Saatmata kirjade lood
programme.desc: Postkontoridetektiivid ei suuda adressaadini toimetada sõjavaeveterani kirja, millest sõltub kellegi on elu. Norman ja Rita jargivad kirjas antud juhtnoore ning reis viib nende suhte uuele tasandile ja kohta, kus neid kõige rohkem vajatakse. Oliver ja Joe lahevad matkale, mille kaigus seab tõsine vigastus nende mõlema elu ohtu. Kui kõik tundub olevat kadunud, leitakse ules kõige olulisem.

programme.title: Aragoni printsess
programme.desc: Katariina seisab silmitsi dilemmaga - kas abielluda kuningas Henry Tudoriga ja saada kohe Inglismaa kuningannaks või leida viis keelduda ja Harryt oodata.

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Kui jatkuvad uksikkohtingud, soovivad Ben, Luke ja Wes oma asja leitud suhted proovile panna. Seejarel on aeg grupikohtumiseks, kus minnakse spaasse lõõgastuma ja lõbutsema.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus

programme.title: Valelikud võrgutajad
programme.desc: A on tagasi kõigi eludes ja see tekitab kõigis soovi tema isik võimalikult kiiresti paljastada. Ali valmistub Rosewoodist põgenema ja Hannat tabavad valjakutsed suhtega. Uurija Tanner võtab Shana surma uurimise tõsisemalt ette.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Saarelised jagavad oma mõtteid viimase paaride umberjagamise osas. Noormehi ootab uus valjakutse.

programme.title: Majajahtijad
programme.desc: Texasest parit paar seisab oma uut California kodu renoveerides silmitsi oluliselt tõsisemate kusimustega.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Kas Mari ja Indrek on abielukriisist ule saanud? Mis juhtus Kertuga? Kas Piret ja Urmas on lõplikult lahus? Millise plaaniga ullatab Sirje Albertit? Kas Maimul õnnestub Erikule lõpuks too leida? 12. hooaja avaosa annab vastused!

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Doktor Zabaleta kardab Elsa elu parast. Adela keeldub umber mõtlemast. Julieta tahab vaeseid aidata.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud. Austraalia

programme.title: Saateapsud
programme.desc: Labi aegade on rahvale pakkunud lusti vaadata teletegijate apse - nemad ka ju ikkagi inimesed! Lõbusas erisaates naeme, mis toimub tegelikult menusaadete kaadri taga ja kuidas armastatud eetrinaod ootamatute olukordadega toime tulevad! Saates naeb milliste ootamatustega on rinda pistnud "Õhtu" saatejuhtid Piret, Juri ja Robert, mis ajab pisarateni naerma "Papside" sarja naitlejaid või mida ehmatavat on juhtunud "15 kusimuse" salvestuse ajal.

programme.title: Saateapsud 2024
programme.desc: Labi aegade on rahvale pakkunud lusti vaadata teletegijate apse – nemad ka ju ikkagi inimesed! Saates naeb milliste ootamatustega on rinda pistnud “Õhtu” saatejuhtid Piret, Juri ja Robert, mis ajab pisarateni naerma “Papside” sarja naitlejaid, mis viperused leidsid aset “Olumpiastuudios” või mille lõbusaga on saatejuht Andrei Zevakin “Noore meistri” salvestustel hakkama saanud.

programme.title: Võmmid
programme.desc: Politsei uurib auto kohta, mis võib olla varastatud. Naine palub politsei abi halbade harjumuste seljatamisel. Vallaline naine planeerib kohtingut netist leitud kallimaga, kuid õhtu kisub õige kiirelt rappa.

programme.title: Võmmid
programme.desc: Perekonda tabab ehmatus, kui põgenev kahtlusalune nende majja siseneb. Politsei lahendab kahe lapsepõlvesõbra vahelist kaootilist vaidlust. Kahtlust aratavas sõidukis naisel on raakida tõest oma versioon.

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: Kui Rocky sõber hukkub matšis vene poksija Ivan Dragoga, suudistab Rocky selles iseennast. Ärritatuna noore superpoksija ulbest kaitumisest astub Rocky uue tšempioni vastu poksiringi.

programme.title: Võmmid

programme.title: Eestlased Euroopas koroonalõksus
programme.desc: Saatejuht Leho Lehis tegi Euroopale ringi peale ajal, mil koroona maailma sisuliselt pausile oli pannud. Saates tutvume eestlastega, kes end Euroopa erinevates riikides on mugavalt sisse sattinud. Kes on need eestlased ja kuidas kaib elu keset pandeemiat? Koroonapiirangud on elu Hollandis taiesti peapeale pooranud. Leho on esmalt hadas tuhja kõhuga, kui see mure saab lahendatud, siis tekib kohe uus - avalikud WC-d puuduvad. Appi tõttab tore hollandlane, kes saatejuhile lahendust pakub ning oma koju kutsub.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Kõigil Bundydel hakkab ootamatult vedama, aga Alile meenub kohe Bundyde needus ja ta teab, et having pole kaugel.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Marcy puuab saada võitu rahva ees kõnelemise hirmust, mis aga kuigi hasti ei õnnestu. Alist saab rapivideofriik.

programme.title: Minu pere mõrvamusteerium. Juhtum lõpetatud?
programme.desc: Vandeadvokaadid Sasha ja Jeremy uurivad kurikuulsat Šotimaa mõrvajuhtumit aastast 1862, kus tõeliseks tapjaks võis olla hoopis põnev alternatiivne kahtlusalune.

programme.title: Kohtuekspertiis
programme.desc: Tundmatud mees vagistab pargis teismelise tudruku - kas digitaalne ja traditsiooniline kohtuekspertiis suudavad koos tootada, et tuua peamine kahtlusalune kohtu ette?

programme.title: Seks ja mõrv
programme.desc: Romantiline, maaliline paadisõit koidikul võtab hirmsa poore, kui Larry Isenberg ule parda lendab. Lisaks on kadunud ka pool miljonit dollarit, mis võis olla mõrva ajend.

programme.title: Võmmid
programme.desc: Varastatud veoki omanik markab oma sõidukit lahedal asuvas kõrvaltanavas ja teavitab politseid. Põgeneva autojuhi tagaajamine viib ulel suletud silla. Politsei leiab alkoholipoes võltsitud 100-dollarilisega maksnud kahtlusaluse.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Walker, Trivette ja CD lahevad koos puhkusele, kuid see lõpeb, kui nad avastavad narkootikume tootva tehase.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Alexi elu satub ohtu, kui ta kuuleb politseinikest, kes tegelevad uimastite muumisega.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Kohalik maffiaboss paneb valja miljoni dollarilise autasu sellele, kes tapab Walkeri.

programme.desc: Sasha ja Jeremy uurivad juhtumit, kus politseiametniku vastuoluline tapmine tõi kaasa kumnete kahtlusaluste kokkutoomise ja lõppes kolme mehe hukkamisega.

programme.title: Kohtuekspertiis
programme.desc: Kriminalistide arvates pole mingit kahtlust, et Tamar Moustafa mõrvas oma naise ja naabri, ent kui politsei hakkab teda ule kuulama, ei maleta ta mõrvadest midagi.

programme.desc: Halloweeni ool saabub vikatimees, kes lubab Ali kaasa viia, kui ukski pereliige teda ei taha.

programme.desc: 22. martsil 2018 tapeti 24-aastane Alex Woodworth jõhkral moel 16 noahoobiga pahe, kaela, kubemesse ja ulakehasse Ezra McCandlessi autos Spring Brookis Wisconsinis. McCandlessile maarati mõrva eest 2020. aastal eluaegne vanglakaristus.

programme.title: SEAL Team
programme.desc: Kui lipnik Davis avastab, et Ray võib olla Vahemerel asuvas laevakonteineris, uritab Bravo meeskond meeleheitlikult oma venda paasta, enne kui selleks on liiga hilja.

programme.desc: Halloweeni ool saabub vikatimees, kes lubab Ali kaasa viia, kui ukski pereliige teda ei taha.

programme.title: Minu pere mõrvamusteerium. Juhtum lõpetatud?
programme.desc: Sasha ja Jeremy uurivad juhtumit, kus politseiametniku vastuoluline tapmine tõi kaasa kumnete kahtlusaluste kokkutoomise ja lõppes kolme mehe hukkamisega.

programme.title: Kohtuekspertiis
programme.desc: Kriminalistide arvates pole mingit kahtlust, et Tamar Moustafa mõrvas oma naise ja naabri, ent kui politsei hakkab teda ule kuulama, ei maleta ta mõrvadest midagi.

programme.title: Seks ja mõrv
programme.desc: 22. martsil 2018 tapeti 24-aastane Alex Woodworth jõhkral moel 16 noahoobiga pahe, kaela, kubemesse ja ulakehasse Ezra McCandlessi autos Spring Brookis Wisconsinis. McCandlessile maarati mõrva eest 2020. aastal eluaegne vanglakaristus.

programme.title: Võmmid
programme.desc: Politsei peatab lõbusõitu nautiva teismeliste seltskonna. Kontrollpunktis saab alguse uhe vaga kahetseva olekuga kahtlusaluse teekond paranemise suunas. Kahtlusalune vaidab, et ta auto ei ole varastatud, sest ta on netis asja uurinud.

programme.title: Võmmid
programme.desc: Varastatud sõiduki leidmisel avastatakse tulirelv ja pikk kuritegelik minevik. Uurijate teele satub autoroovi kaigus arandatud auto. Politseinikud raagivad mehega, kellel on relvaohutusest oma arusaamine.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Korravalvurid kohtuvad Jaapani maffiaga, kui asuvad paastma nende kaes olevaid pantvange.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Korravalvuritel on raskusi kohtuasja võtmetunnistajaga, kes korduvalt põgeneda puuab.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Lihtsat kuritegu uurides satuvad korravalvurid jalile suurele rongiroovikatsele.

programme.title: Minu pere mõrvamusteerium. Juhtum lõpetatud?
programme.desc: Sasha ja Jeremy uurivad 1863. aastal toimunud mõrvajuhtumit, kus kadunud taskukell osutus tahtsaks tõendiks, mille tõttu mees mõisteti suudi ja poodi.

programme.title: Kohtuekspertiis
programme.desc: Kui politsei sõidab valja hadaabisse tulnud kõne peale, leiavad nad eest pussitatud teismelise.

programme.title: Seks ja mõrv

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Al võtab toole asja keskkooli lõpetanud poisi ja raagib talle, milline abielu tegelikult valja naeb. Kelly pritsib endale putukamurki silma ja temast saab terminaator.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Kui naised vallutavad nii Ali keeglisaali kui striptiisibaari, hakkab mees tegutsema ja tungib uhte jutusaatesse.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: Esimesest matšist on moodas 30 aastat. Endisest kuulsusest on jaanud vaid jutud, mida Rocky kulalistele oma restoranis raagib. Olukord muutub, kui valitseva maailmameistri Mason Dixoni esindajad tema ja Masoni vahel poksimatši korraldavad.

programme.title: Seks ja mõrv
programme.desc: Rutiinne ost võib juhtida politsei noore ema Laura Ackersoni tapja jalile. Laura kehaosad leiti alligaatoreist kubisevast ojast 2000 km kaugusel kohast, kus teda viimati nahti.

programme.title: SEAL Team
programme.desc: Ajal, mil Bravo jatkab suurte muudatustega, alustab meeskond missiooni Ecuadoris. Natalie esitab Jasonile elumuutva idee.

programme.title: Suvereporter
programme.desc: Sadagu vihma või siragu paike! Suvereporter toob televaatajani kõige olulisemad uudised ja mahlakamad palad Eestimaa erinevaist paigust, nii maalt kui merelt, festivalidelt ja sundmustelt, aga ka Tartu mnt Meediamaja rõdult ning Fahle troopiliselt tanavagaleriilt. Saadet juhivad Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Punane sekund
programme.desc: Kui kokku põrkavad rong ja sõiduauto, on autosviibijate võimalused ellu jaada vaga vaikesed. Aga miks sellised õnnetused juhtuvad? Kuidas on võimalik mitte margata lahenevat rongi? Ometi juhtus nii vanema prouaga ning kahe noore inimesega, kellega juhtunut esimene saade analuusib. Liiklusohutuse eksperdid ja saatejuht Madis Kimmel tuletavad meelde, miks raudteeuletamisel tasub olla eriliselt ettevaatlik!

programme.title: Suvereporter

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.sub-title: Neli palli, kaks kurikat ja uks kinnas
programme.desc: Alan ja Lyndsey otsustavad proovida kolmekat - esimene kord Waldeniga ja teine kord Alani valitud naisega. Walden on valmis osalema, kuid Lyndsey poorab voodis talle liigselt tahelepanu.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.sub-title: Sa tead, mille eest pulgakomm on
programme.desc: Walden tunneb ennast vanana, kui arvab, et sõber Missi loob talle kulge - kuid avastab siis, et Missi puuab teda hoopis oma emaga kokku viia. Jake saab sõjavaest nadalavahetuseks koju ja armub kohe Mississe.

programme.title: Ema
programme.desc: Christy on uksikema, kes parast alkoholismi ja narkosõltuvusega võitlemist otsutab teha oma elule restardi. Ta alustab tood ettekandjana, kaib korraparaselt AA kohtumistel kohal ning elu tundub õigel teel olevat, kuniks tema ellu ja majja trugib tagasi tema ema Bonnie.

programme.title: Brooklyni jaoskond

programme.title: Brooklyni jaoskond
programme.desc: Jake aitab Rosal vanematele tahtsat uudist teatada.

programme.desc: Monica ja Chandler sõidavad koos Atlantic Citysse, kus aga nende salasuhe peaaegu avalikuks tuleb. Ross ei saa kuidagi Rachelile oeldud, et ei tohi enam temaga kohtuda.

programme.title: Sõbrad
programme.desc: Joeyle ei meeldi, et Monica ja Chandler tema korteris kohtuvad. Monica ja Rachel usuvad, et nende majja on kolinud jeti.

programme.title: Minu nimi on Earl
programme.desc: Earl Hickey on pisisuli, kes jaab auto alla ja kaotab loteriipileti 100 tuhandele dollarile.Nuud asub ta karmavõlga heastama. Rohtude mõju all allkirjastab ta lahtutuspaberid ning alustab vigade heastamist Kennyst.

programme.title: Minu nimi on Earl
programme.desc: Randy ja Catalina puuavad Earli panna "suitsetamisest loobuma". Nad viivad ta ka Donny Jonesi juurde, kes istus 2 aastat Earli sooritatud kuriteo eest. Joy uritab Earli tappa, et raha parida.

programme.title: Kõik armastavad Raymondit
programme.desc: Debra saab teada, et nad ostsid Raymondi nõudmisel Franki ja Marie vana auto ara, kuna Raymond oli noorpõlves selles skoorinud.

programme.title: Kõik armastavad Raymondit
programme.desc: Kui Raymond saab teada, et Debra kihlasõrmus on võltsitud, puuab ta selle vargsi valja vahetada. Aga miks Debra vahetusest teada saades nii endast valja laheb?

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Walden kutsub Rosei enda juurde elama. Siis aga helistab Zoey, kes on valmis katkenud suhet lappima. Kui Walden sellest Roseile raagib, on sellel kurvad tagajarjed.

programme.title: Tuvikesed

programme.title: Tuvikesed

programme.title: Tuleb tuttav ette
programme.desc: Ansambel "Laine" on Eesti popmuusikas ainulaadne nahtus: nii pikaealist naisansamblit meil ei ole ega ka vist tule. Kuigi "Laine" oli ulipopulaarne juba paris 60. aastate alguses, siis teletahistaevasse tõusis ta parast 1966. aastal valminud filmi "Neli blondi ja neli brunetti". Filmi režissooriks oli Astrid Lepa. Stuudios on loomulikult ka mõned blondid ja brunetid.

programme.title: Eesti aja lood
programme.desc: Aeg 1944. aasta kevadest kuni hilise sugiseni oli Eestis taas pingeline. Lahingute kulg ennustas uhtede okupantide lahkumist ja jargmiste tulekut. Rahvuslikud vastupanujõud olid aga siiski sedavõrd organiseerunud, et võimuhaaramine ja riigi taastamine ei tundunud taiesti võimatu. Saate autor Mati Talvik, režissoor Indrek Kangur.

programme.title: Tuleb tuttav ette
programme.desc: 21. juulil 1981. aastal salvestati Prangli saarel esimene saade sarjast "Kodukandilood", režissoor oli Erich Rein. Saatesari sai kiiresti uheks vaadatavamaks Eesti Televisioonis - kulastati ju televaatajate kodukanti, asus see siis millises Eestimaa nurgas iganes. 19. oktoobril 1992 oli eetris sarja sajas saade. programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Murdoch ja Crabtree võitlevad vanglast põgenemise ja pangaroovi jarel teadetega kahurikaega robotist.

programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Kui advokaadi mõrv lavastatakse koerarunnakuna, kahtlustab Murdoch, et kurjategijad otsisid koera, kellele on parandatud varandus.

programme.title: Preili Scarlet ja Hertsog
programme.desc: Eliza on sattunud kadunuks jaanud isikute juhtumisse koos hiljuti vabanenud suudimõistetu, Patrick Nashiga.

programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Kui katoliiklasest palgamõrvar tapetakse, peab Murdoch võitlema võimsa protestantliku juhiga, kes oli nende sihtmargiks.

programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Murdoch ja Brackenreid on šokeeritud, kui naitleja Hamleti etenduses nende silme all laval sureb.

programme.title: Inspektor Ricciardi
programme.desc: Tuntud kirurg kukub oma kontori aknast surnuks. Ricciardi ja Maionei juurdlus tekitab ebameeldivaid tundeid ja viib sudantlõhestava avastuseni.

programme.title: Dalgliesh
programme.desc: Tundu krimikirjaniku P. D. Jamesi lugude peategelaseks on mõistatuslik inspektor Dalgliesh. Sari jalgib tema karjaari alates 1970ndate Inglismaalt kuni tanapaevani, kui ta lahendab ebatavalisi mõrvalugusid.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Sidney Chambers on Grantchesteri vikaar; tõugatuna ohtlikku valede, reetmise ja mõrvade maailma, leiab Sidney, et saab ka detektiivi ametis suureparaselt hakkama.

programme.title: Miss Fisheri mõrvalood
programme.desc: 1964: kui Peregrine Fisheri tundmatu tadi jaab kadunuks, parib naine sullekukkunud varanduse ja peab tõestama, et tal on piisavalt nutti, et saada maailmatasemel eradetektiiviks.

programme.title: Inspektor George Gently
programme.desc: Kui kohalike aristokraatide nimele registreeritud kummuli sõidetud autost leitakse noore tudruku surnukeha, saavad Gently ja Bacchus omal nahal tunda kõrgel sotsiaalsel positsioonil olevate isikute ulespuhutud autoriteeti.

programme.title: Archie
programme.desc: Archie Leach põgeneb oma rahutu lapsepõlve eest Bristolis ja suundub Hollywoodi, et saada Cary Grantiks; ta leiab lõpuks edu, kuid kas ta suudab leida ka õnne?

programme.title: Suured loomad, vaiksed loomad
programme.desc: On Jimmy ristimispaev ja kõik soovivad selle eriliseks muuta. Helen ja proua Hall valmistuvad Jamesi vanemaid võõrustama ja Siegfried kirjutab oma ristivanema kõnet.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Sidney Chambers on Grantchesteri vikaar; tõugatuna ohtlikku valede, reetmise ja mõrvade maailma, leiab Sidney, et saab ka detektiivi ametis suureparaselt hakkama.

programme.title: Inspektor George Gently
programme.desc: Kui kohalike aristokraatide nimele registreeritud kummuli sõidetud autost leitakse noore tudruku surnukeha, saavad Gently ja Bacchus omal nahal tunda kõrgel sotsiaalsel positsioonil olevate isikute ulespuhutud autoriteeti.

programme.title: Archie
programme.desc: Archie Leach põgeneb oma rahutu lapsepõlve eest Bristolis ja suundub Hollywoodi, et saada Cary Grantiks; ta leiab lõpuks edu, kuid kas ta suudab leida ka õnne?

programme.title: Preili Scarlet ja Hertsog
programme.desc: Hertsog on kuude kaupa eemal olnud ja uus detektiiviinspektor paneb Eliza Scarleti politsei heaks kõvasti tood tegema. Kõik need muudatused tekitavad uhe kusimuse - kas Elizal on tõesti kõik olemas?

programme.title: Miss Marple
programme.desc: Miss Marplei endine toatudruk satub uues tookohas otse mõrvade keskele. Mõrvar peab oma tapatoodes sõna-sõnalt kinni tuntud lastesalmist, kuid miss Marple aimab, et see on vaid puru silma ajamiseks.

programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Murdochi uurib lennuõnnetust, mille kaigus piloot hukkus ning paljastub James Pendrickiga seotud nurjatu vandenõu.

programme.title: Miss Fisheri mõrvalood
programme.desc: Peregrinei rõõm eelseisvate pulmade ule jaab uurikeseks, kui stjuuardesside koolituse ajal avastatakse naise laip.

programme.title: Miss Marple
programme.desc: Miss Marple satub oma suurima valjakutse otsa, kui ta saab oma surnud sõbralt Rafielilt juhtnoorid uurida võimalikku kuritegu. Ometi ei sisalda see vihje mingit infot, millise kuritooga võib tegemist olla.

programme.desc: Tristan puuab taas Skeldale ellu sisse elada, aga Carmody on ta voodi ja venna kaaperdanud! Samal ajal proovib James haiget lehma ravima kutsutud murelikku Sid Crabtreed rahustada.

programme.title: Miss Marple
programme.desc: Miss Marple kohtab rongis vanemat daami, kes sõidab Scotland Yardi mõrvarit ules andma. Kui veidi hiljem loeb miss Marple ajalehest sellesama vanaproua surmast, ei jaa tal muud ule, kui sõita rahulikku alevikku asja ise uurima.

programme.desc: Kui advokaadi mõrv lavastatakse koerarunnakuna, kahtlustab Murdoch, et kurjategijad otsisid koera, kellele on parandatud varandus.

programme.desc: Murdoch ja Ogden roovitakse ning varskelt ametisse maaratud inspektor Crabtree esimene ulesanne on nad ules leida.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Kui naiste kolledži õpilane leitakse surnuna, peavad Will ja Geordie leidma tee labi ulikoolilinnaku poliitika ja ulikooli joogiklubide hamara maailma, et selgitada valja mõrvar.
